5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Abbas that the Prophet (ﷺ) prayed on the day of ‘Eid with no Adhan and no Iqamah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the ‘Eid Prayers
